document_data.name: Glowrod
document_data.mainbody: A '''glowrod''' was a small metal [[rod]] that glowed with bright light.
document_data.Description: Most glowrods were made of [[steel]] and had a cover to block their light when not in use.
document_data.Powers: The bright light from a glowrod was normally yellow-white in color.
document_data.History: [[Vangerdahast]] knew how to create a glowrod.
